alert.note: Alert for Coal; Hughes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 11 at 11:21PM CDT until May 11 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Coal County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Hughes County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1121 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 5 miles south of Gerty, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Stuart. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter, safe room or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
